## Source: amazon-inspector (6a541a76e308d33ea53424e63677093bd2347634a5f313f6bff9fd62a4fa83c9)
The package ido-sdk-web was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (df3846af2e0564c99c4bb28664ae3acfe77b62a0906f985794e5b028c305332f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ido-sdk-web' @ 99.99.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
